column2: IAN: Tuesday July 6 2021: And How Did You Celebrate The 4th of July?
column5: Tuesday:  A day to: reminisce.      Monday: Crimson Quillfeather Tuesday: ejoanna Wednesday: Pam from Calif Thursday: art ah zen Friday: FloridaSNMOM Saturday: FloridaSNDad Sunday: loggersbrat Still wiping the mustard off my face from all those hot dogs on the Fourth.  So let’s all share what we did on the Fourth of July.   It was pretty quiet here around Rancho EJ.  Vegan hot dogs and the CNN musical offerings (Hey! The Beach Boys!!) later in the day. Not hot which is good.  No fires nearby: even better. But of course no precip. The Drought continues. . .  So what was the Fourth for you? Plus. . .our SF Giants won their game against the Diamondbacks! Yippppeeeee!!!
